description: HAProxy Kubernetes Ingress Controller – comprehensive monitoring: traffic, errors, latency, backend health, sessions, and pod resource usage.

panels.title: Connect / Queue / Total Time by Backend

panels.description: Connections/s for ALL frontends (HTTP and TCP). HTTP frontends also count here — use this panel primarily to monitor TCP proxies.
panels.title: TCP / HTTP Connection Rate by Frontend

panels.description: Bytes transferred per backend — works for both TCP and HTTP backends.
panels.title: Backend Bytes In / -Out (TCP + HTTP)

panels.description: Active TCP sessions per backend server. High session counts on TCP backends (databases, message brokers, etc.) indicate connection pooling pressure.
panels.title: Active Sessions per Backend Server

panels.description: Connection errors at server level. For TCP services these indicate refused or dropped connections.
panels.title: Server Connection Errors (TCP + HTTP)

title: HAProxy Kubernetes Ingress
